apikey.comment: Your api key for your Luxor account
username.comment: Your username for your Luxor account
outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
subheadingText.comment: A label beneath the main header useful for identifying the miner
hashrateTarget.comment: The hashrate per second for the expected miner output
hashrateLowThreshold.comment: The hashrate level for which hashing should be considered low
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDataValue.comment: The color of the text values for major categories expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotFill.comment: The color to plot a dot for the hashrate when normal at a point in time expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotOutline.comment: The color to make the outline of plotted dots for normal hashrate expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotFillZero.comment: The color to plot a dot for the hashrate when it is zero/unreported at a point in time expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotOutlineZero.comment: The color to make the outline of plotted dots for zero/unreported hashrate expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotFillLow.comment: The color to plot a dot for the hashrate when it below the low threshold at a point in time expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashDotOutlineLow.comment: The color to make the outline of plotted dots for low hashrate expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMovingAverage.comment: The color to use for the moving average line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineLight.comment: The color to use for the left and bottom borders of the plot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGraphLineDark.comment: The color to use for the right and top borders of the blot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
